担々麺: (タンタンメン) - Szechuan dish of noodles covered with a sauce of sesame paste and chili oil (chi: dan dan mian)
担い: (にない) - carrying (on one's shoulder)/bearing/shouldering/taking responsibility for; bucket carried on either end of a pole
担いおけ: (にないおけ) - bucket carried on either end of a pole
担い手: (にないて) - bearer/carrier; person bearing responsibility/person in charge/supporter
担い桶: (にないおけ) - bucket carried on either end of a pole
担う: (になう) - to carry on shoulder; to bear (burden); to shoulder (gun)
担がんマウス: (たんがんまうす) - tumour-bearing mouse; tumor-bearing mouse
担ぎだす: (かつぎだす) - to carry something out of a place; to elevate (someone) to a high position/to convince someone to accept a post (esp. through flattery); to mention something/to broach a topic/to bring up (a subject)/to raise (an issue)/to mention
担ぎ上げる: (かつぎあげる) - to carry up/to bring up/to lift up; to elevate (someone) to a high position/to convince someone to accept a post (esp. through flattery)
担ぎ出す: (かつぎだす) - to carry something out of a place; to elevate (someone) to a high position/to convince someone to accept a post (esp. through flattery); to mention something/to broach a topic/to bring up (a subject)/to raise (an issue)/to mention
担ぎ回る: (かつぎまわる) - to carry something around

担ぎ込む: (かつぎこむ) - to carry something into a place
担ぐ: (かつぐ) - to shoulder/to carry on one's shoulder; to take (someone) for a ride/to deceive/to take in

担任の先生: (たんにんのせんせい) - class teacher; homeroom teacher; form teacher
担任教師: (たんにんきょうし) - class teacher; homeroom teacher; form teacher

担保物権: (たんぽぶっけん) - real rights obtained by security
担子菌門: (たんしきんもん) - Basidiomycota; phylum containing mushrooms, puffballs, etc.
担当: (tantou) - being in charge (of an area of responsibility), being responsible (para um cargo de trabalho, etc.)
担当医: (たんとうい) - attending physician; doctor-in-charge; attending doctor; one's doctor
担当官: (たんとうかん) - case worker; case officer
担当者: (たんとうしゃ) - person in charge (of an area of work, but not necessarily supervising other staff); person responsible; one in charge; responsible party; contact (person)
担当課長: (たんとうかちょう) - section manager
担当部長: (たんとうぶちょう) - senior manager; director; person below the department head with responsibility for a particular area
担担麺: (タンタンメン) - Szechuan dish of noodles covered with a sauce of sesame paste and chili oil (chi: dan dan mian)
担持: (たんじ) - support (e.g. of an element acting as a catalyst)

拈くれる: (ひねくれる) - to be contrary; to be uncooperative; to be rebellious
拈り: (ひねり) - twist/spin; ingenuity/sophistication (e.g. of writing style); wrapped offering (of money); {sumo} twisting throw
拈る: (ひねる) - to twist/to wrench/to turn (a switch on or off, etc.)/to wring (a neck); to puzzle over; to defeat easily

拉致被害者: (らちひがいしゃ) - abduction victims; abductees
拉麺: (らあめん) - ramen (chi: lamian); Chinese-style noodles
